title: State v. Pamela Lanier – Addendum 4 – Afterglow
content:encoded:
May 17, 2018 / Rabia Chaudry, Colin Miller, and Rebecca Lavoie talk with guest Amber Hunt about the Pam Lanier series and Amber’s new podcast.

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

Today’s Addendum is sponsored by Blue Apron.
